SCRIPT.MSCRI: :SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :SET &JOB_TYPE# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_JCL_VAR') :SET &UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_BIN', &AGENT#) :IF &JOB_TYPE# = "WINDOWS" ! @echo off : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" cd "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL : ELSE cd /d "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &JOB_TYPE# = "UNIX" cd $HOME : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL cd "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :ENDIF
